knimeNode.name: PDB Connector Custom Report
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is no longer functional due to the shutdown of the remote webservices

p.b: This node is no longer functional due to the shutdown of the remote webservices - Please use the new 'PDB Connector Structure Standard Report' node instead

intro.p: The new PDB Connector Custom Report node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) , based on the original PDB Connector node developed by Enspiral Discovery in collaboration with Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

ports.inPort: Incoming table containing a column of PDB structure IDs
